title: Fix flawed parity check in Zeedub & Hokey
description: Replace run-both-and-compare parity logic with fast-path conditional fallback that skips duplicate Rust/Python runs.

comments.author: root
comments.text: Swapped the parity check to a single Rust attempt with exception/type fallback and restored RNG state before calling the Python path. Zeedub and Hokey now avoid double-running both implementations but still degrade gracefully when the extension misbehaves.

title: Review rust/ for tech debt opportunities post migration
description: Audit rust crate for cleanup opportunities; note findings
notes: Refactored PyGlitchOperation parsing to reuse helpers and ran cargo check.

title: Refactor DLC integrations: Remove monkey-patching, consolidate logic, move shared code
description:
Completed DLC refactoring:
- Moved resolve_environment from _shared.py to prime.py
- Consolidated shared logic into _shared.py (infer_batch_targets, corrupt_batch, BaseGlitchedDataLoader, wrap_dataloader)
- Created public wrapper APIs: GlitchedDataset, GlitchedDataLoader, GlitchedLightningDataModule
- Removed install() functions and monkey-patching code
- Removed install_* exports from dlc/__init__.py
- Updated all tests to use new wrapper-based API
- All tests passing, code linted and type-checked

title: Run full pytest suite
notes: Installed pytest dependencies and ran python3 -m pytest --capture=no with full success (255 passed, 21 skipped).

title: Review ekkokin implementation for bugs/testing gaps
description: Audit ekkokin glitchling code and tests for issues.
notes: Identified pipeline descriptor bug: weighting isn't normalized when mutated via set_param, which breaks Rust pipeline; test gap noted.

title: Extract substring swap backend into lexicon submodule
notes: Moved dictionary-driven substring helpers into glitchlings.lexicon.substring and repointed Jargoyle, Ekkokin, and Spectroll.

title: Fix Auggie builder typing and behaviour
notes: Pointed Auggie imports at concrete modules for typing, tightened builder tests, and verified ruff/mypy/pytest.

title: Revamp metrics TUI layout and docs
notes: Rebuilt the metrics TUI layout with split panes, responsive CSS, docs, screenshot, and a smoke test.

title: Implement glitchling & tokenizer managers
description: Add selection panels for built-in glitchlings, parameter editor UI, tokenizer adapter manager, and preset serialization for Attack on Token.
notes: Implemented glitchling/tokenizer managers with new SessionState helpers, Textual panels, docs, and tests.

title: Legacy glitchling parameter cleanup
description:
Summarizes the removed aliases and YAML schema changes formerly tracked in CHANGELOG.md:
- Legacy glitchling parameter aliases (e.g., max_change_rate, replacement_rate) are removed in favor of rate.
- YAML attack rosters must use the name: field instead of deprecated type:.
- Default rate handling now lives within each glitchling; glitchlings.zoo._rate was removed.

title: Finalize Attack on Token UX, docs, and tests
description: Persist config/presets, add history view, document usage, and cover new flows with unit + snapshot tests.
notes: Visualization panel removed; workspace diff logs now custom rich-text widgets with wrap.

title: Migrate Spectroll to Rust
notes: Continuing Spectroll Rust migration: finish PythonRandom integration and restore drift parity.

title: Re-encode Mim1c homoglyph asset as text-friendly compression
description: Replace the binary .gz asset with a text-encoded variant and update build + packaging to decode/decompress it.

title: Audit rust rewrite for vestigial python fallback
notes: Removed Hokey fallback, centralized rust loader, updated docs/tests

title: Fix Jargoyle default lexicon regression
notes: Added regression test ensuring Jargoyle instantiates the configured default lexicon.

title: Improve Attack diff fidelity
description: Upgrade Attack on Token diff view to highlight token-level changes instead of basic line diffs.
notes: Inline diff view + tokenizer diff tab implemented in TUI with helper tests.

title: Development environment reference
description:
Captured the setup guidance previously stored in docs/development.md:
- Requires Python 3.10+, optional Rust toolchain with maturin.
- Create a virtual environment, install via 'pip install -e .[dev]' (add prime or vectors extras as needed).
- Install pre-commit hooks with 'pre-commit install'.
- Rebuild or extend the bundled lexicon via 'glitchlings build-lexicon' commands when updating synonym caches.
- Run tests with 'pytest' and quality gates: ruff check ., black --check ., isort --check-only ., python -m mypy --config-file pyproject.toml, pytest --maxfail=1 --disable-warnings -q.
- Compile Rust accelerators using 'maturin develop -m rust/zoo/Cargo.toml'; toggle GLITCHLINGS_RUST_PIPELINE to force Python path.
- Additional tips: rerun maturin after editing rust/zoo/, smoke-test CLI with 'python -m glitchlings --help', keep docs/index.md aligned with behaviour changes, reference docs/release-process.md for publishing steps, and validate YAML attack rosters via glitchlings.config.ATTACK_CONFIG_SCHEMA.

title: Integrate metrics and in-app visualizations
description: Compute metrics via create_default_registry, display sortable tables, and embed radar/heatmap/embedding charts inside the Textual app.
notes: Token metrics wired; next add metrics panels + viz surfaces.

title: Fix Jargoyle default lexicon regression test failure
notes: Guarded Jargoyle initialization so the configured default lexicon is instantiated and retained even when the base constructor skips setting it, then reran quality gates to verify the fix.

title: Fix metrics TUI output blank state
description: Investigate why running the metrics TUI shows the input panel but no output/metrics/diff panels populate, and restore the expected behavior.
notes: Enabled the token diff/debug panels by default (with placeholder copy) so the optional views immediately show results, and expanded the picker forms with new text controls for typogre, pedant, redacytl, spectroll, mim1c, and zeedub parameters. Added PickerTextControl support, metadata configs, and regression tests for the CLI/tokenizer parsing and picker options.

title: Implement Spectroll color swapping glitchling
description: Add tests, implementation, drift mode, registration, and docs for Spectroll
notes: Implemented Spectroll glitchling with literal and drift modes, tests, docs, and examples

title: Fix Pedant casing and mile conversion
description: Preserve casing in Fewerling/Subjunic replacements and ensure Oxforda converts singular mile.
notes: Preserved casing for Fewerling/Subjunic outputs and taught Oxforda to convert singular mile with case-aware kilometre units.

title: Enhance metrics TUI UX
description: Add editable text + glitchling selection, integrate CLI

title: Rename Pedant forms
description: Ensure Pedant stone and form renames (Ultimate -> Correctopus, Aetherial -> Aetheria, Aetherite -> Coeurite) propagate across Python and Rust implementations.
notes: Renamed Pedant stones/forms across Python and Rust (Aetherite->Coeurite, Aetherial->Aetheria, Pedagorgon->Correctopus), updated tests, and verified pedant suite.

title: Rushmore tech-debt fixes
description: Tackle whitespace preservation, shared weighting helper, rushmore swap token rewrite, and config table cleanup.
notes: Work complete; Rushmore helpers cleaned and pytest tests/rust/test_rust_backed_glitchlings.py -k Rushmore passes.

title: Optimize Python gaggle orchestration
description: Investigate buffer-based approach for Gaggle._corrupt_text to avoid repeated tokenization when Rust fast paths are unavailable.

title: Run tests and lint
description: Run full pytest suite and ensure linting/typing pass for current branch.
notes: Ran full pytest suite (279 passed, 17 skipped) after adding wiki_homophones.txt fixture; addressed ruff findings and re-ran lint to cleanly pass; resolved mypy issues via pedant type annotations and ekkokin typing tweaks; verified targeted pedant/ekkokin tests post-fixes.

title: Add ekkokin homophone tests
description: Expand ekkokin test coverage referencing wiki_homophones.txt per TDD.
notes:
Added ekkokin tests covering metadata and homophone replacements; currently failing (module missing).
- Generated structured homophone asset and staged it for Python/Rust consumption.
- Implemented ekkokin Python and Rust homophone pipelines with the shared asset.
- Added weighting normalization and RNG parity tests to cover expected behaviour.
Validated casing preservation and packaging coverage for the shared homophone asset.
Regenerated CLI usage docs, ran lint/type gates, and synced ekkokin tests for rust/python parity.
Set CLI doc generator to clamp COLUMNS=80 so README snapshots match the linted help output.

notes: Imported the Rust module eagerly with an explicit error when it is missing, required every built-in glitchling to emit a pipeline descriptor with helpful runtime validation, and added typed pipeline payload helpers so Gaggle always feeds structured data to the Rust pipeline.

notes: Updated Aetherial ligature pattern to be case-insensitive, fixed diaeresis placement for title-case 'Oo' digraphs, and added regression tests covering Ã†ther transformation, uppercase AE handling, and the diaeresis helper.

notes: Identified casing regressions in Fewerling/Subjunic replacements and missing singular 'mile' conversion in Oxforda.

notes: Replaced the legacy Python-compatible RNG with a SmallRng-backed deterministic RNG, updated operations and tests to use the new interface, and verified the crate still builds.

notes: Added textual_attack package with AttackOnTokenApp skeleton, CLI subcommand + docs, dependencies, and CI smoke test.

title: Finish SmallRng refactor cleanup
notes: Extension rebuild complete with seed-only API; pedant shim now seed-based. All Rust-backed smoke tests pass under uv.

notes: Retired the prefer_rust parameter from orchestration planners, removed the pipeline feature flag shim, and added regression coverage to assert Rust availability.

title: Align Spectroll with shared RNG
description: Use shared DeterministicRng in Rust Spectroll and remove Python implementation.

title: Fix mypy compat errors
notes: Resolved compat and asset helper mypy complaints; attr assignments use setattr and optional dependency load guard tightened.

title: Pedant docs release prep
description: Audit and update documentation for the new Pedant glitchling so the docs folder is ready for release.
notes: Added dedicated docs/glitchlings/pedant.md page, linked it from docs/index.md and mkdocs navigation, and verified gallery coverage.

title: Refactor substring swap backend for jargoyle variants
notes: Refactored Jargoyle's lexicon backend with dictionary-driven substring swaps, reused it for Ekkokin and Spectroll, and ran targeted pytest suites.

title: Fix build failures and diagnose test errors
description: Fix failing build so project installs/builds cleanly, then investigate and document current pytest failures.
notes: Replaced the broken WSL junction at src/glitchlings/assets with real files so builds/tests can see the bundled data. Verified package build (python -m build) and full pytest run now pass.

title: Investigate performance regressions for apstrofae, ekkokin, pedant, and hokey rust fast paths
notes: Reproduced the perf doc output (docs/performance-comparison.md) and added a fresh run at build/perf-temp.md showing Apostrofae/Ekkokin/Pedant/Hokey speedups hover at ~1x. Read the Rust fast paths in rust/zoo/src/glitch_ops.rs, rust/zoo/src/ekkokin.rs, rust/zoo/src/hokey.rs, and rust/zoo/src/pedant.rs; all four convert the TextBuffer back into owned strings, clone tokens, and lean on regex/string rebuilds, so the pipeline loses most of the advantage over the Python versions. Findings handed off for follow-up optimization ideas.

title: Normalize Ekkokin weighting in pipeline descriptor
description: Ensure weighting remains normalized when mutating Ekkokin, add regression tests.
notes: Normalized weighting via Ekkokin.set_param override and pipeline descriptor guard; added regression test asserting mutated weighting stays lowercase. Unable to run pytest because python installation lacks pip/pytest modules.

title: Rushmore regression fixes
description: Restore compatibility after rushmore refactor: accept seed kwarg, tidy whitespace output, and keep Adjax signature stable.
notes: Patched rushmore.py whitespace reconstruction, restored seed kwarg support, synchronized Reduple/Adjax wrapper params, and reran pytest CLI/core/rust suites.

title: Install mypy

title: Update docs for Rust-only core
notes: Refreshed developer guide, index overview, performance docs, and glitchling references to state the Rust pipeline is mandatory; updated performance tooling blurb accordingly.

description: Resolve the longstanding F401/F821 warnings (unused fixture imports, unused modules in DLC tests), and ensure lint passes cleanly.
notes: Added Ruff suppressions for fixture re-exports in tests/conftest.py, removed an unused Iterable import, and cleaned up the PyTorch DLC tests' imports/typing. Ruff now passes alongside mypy src, uv build, and pytest.

description: Resolve Textual BadIdentifier errors in picker form checkbox IDs and ensure glitchlings like typogre expose parameter metadata so picker lists controls.
notes: Added shared rate metadata so typogre/mim1c/zeedub now expose rate controls, sanitized picker checkbox IDs to avoid Textual BadIdentifier errors, and refreshed controller/tests accordingly.

notes: Ported Jargoyle synonyms to Rust, added embedded vector cache, rewired Python shim, and verified builds/tests.

notes: Pedant now forwards the original seed to pedant_transform and keeps the stored seed in sync when Gaggle resets RNG seeds, restoring parity with the Rust pipeline.

Verified with python -m pytest tests/core/test_hokey.py tests/docs/test_build_cli_reference.py.

comments.author: root
